constituent: sincerity, say, words, keitai, mouth, turn into, sword, dagger, parade
heisigStory: The sure sign of sincerity is that one's mere words are turned into deeds.
koohiiStory1: Sincerity happens when what you say actually turns into something.
koohiiStory2: Sincerity is turning your words into actions.
myStory: chân thành. lời nói trở thành hành động là chân thành
words:
誠実(せいじつ): sincere, honest, faithful
誠(まこと): truth, faith, fidelity, sincerity, trust, confidence, reliance, devotion
